overview: Brian is currently the Founder and Chief Product Officer at TestSoup. He brings extensive startup, non-profit, and general management experience leading hundreds of individuals and multi-functional teams in challenging international environments. He is also a Procurement Contracting Officer for the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, MA where he leads a portfolio of programs valued at $600M. In 2011, he deployed to Afghanistan where he a led a joint combat team of Air Force, Army, Navy, and Marines in the procurement of mission critical construction and supplies for NATO soldiers. He is a former Academic All-Conference hockey player for the Division I Air Force Academy Falcons where he led the team to its first Conference Championship and NCAA tournament appearance in school history. Brian is a Distinguished Graduate of Squadron Officer School, Maxwell Air Force Base, AL as well as a Distinguished Graduate of Management from the United States Air Force Academy, Colorado Springs, CO.
